command.name: hud_export
command.description: Saves setup of your HUD (scr_newhud 1) into separate .cfg file.

argument.name: filename
argument.description: Name (with optional path) of saved file. If .cfg extension is not present it will be automatically added.

command.remarks: File will be saved in <basedir>/ezquake/configs if no path is specified in <filename> parameter.
